entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 80 late this afternoon. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
